data.name: HotkeyRegistrationError
data.value: Failed to register the global hotkey ({0}).

data.name: FatalErrorMessage
OfflineStartWarning
data.value: No internet connection detected. Please connect and try again.

data.name: MaxDurationReachedWarning
data.value: Maximum recording duration ({0} min) reached. Stopping recording.

data.name: OfflineAfterRecordingWarning
data.value: No internet connection. Recording stopped, transcription will resume once you are online again.

data.name: OfflineWarning
data.value: Offline mode active: no connection to the OpenAI API.

data.name: OnlineInfo
data.value: Internet connection restored. Transcription is available again.

data.name: SettingsAppliedInfo
data.value: Settings applied. Services have been reinitialized.

data.name: SettingsOpenError
data.value: Settings dialog could not be opened: {0}

data.name: GlossaryLabel
data.value: Custom glossary: (Domain-specific terms, names, products – comma separated)

data.name: GlossaryPlaceholder
data.value: Example: Supreme Court, damages, § 280 BGB, Contoso GmbH

data.name: ServerChunkingLabel
data.value: OpenAI server auto chunking (VAD + loudness normalization)

data.name: VadLabel
data.value: Voice Activity Detection (Silero VAD – removes silence and non-speech)

data.name: LogProbabilitiesLabel
data.value: Return token log probabilities (gpt-4o models only)

data.name: UiLanguageHelp
data.value: Applies immediately for tray text. Full UI refresh may require reopening dialogs.

data.name: BestPracticesText
data.value: These presets follow official OpenAI Cookbook guidance: • Natural-language glossaries improve recognition • GPT-generated prompts add domain context • Temperature = 0 guarantees deterministic output • Post-processing polishes punctuation and formatting

data.name: AboutText
data.value:
OpenAIDictate v1.2.0
Professional voice dictation powered by OpenAI gpt-4o-transcribe.
Highlights: • State-of-the-art accuracy (≥99%) • Global hotkey for any application • GPT-generated prompts for maximum quality • LLM-based post-processing • DPAPI encryption for API keys • No administrator rights required
Built on: • OpenAI Cookbook best practices • Official API documentation • NAudio + Silero VAD
License: MIT © 2025 OpenAIDictate Contributors

data.name: HotkeyInvalidError
data.value: Invalid hotkey format. Examples: F5, Ctrl+Shift+F10.

data.name: ApiKeyRequired
data.value: An OpenAI API key is required. The application will close.

data.name: ApiKeyPromptMessage
data.value: Please enter your OpenAI API key: (available at platform.openai.com)

data.name: SettingsRestartNotice
data.value: Some UI changes may require reopening dialogs to display the new language.
